text: A quartet of teams remained atop Wednesday ’ s Amazing Race finale, but only a single duo would get to take home that million - dollar ( before taxes ) grand prize. The remaining eight players — Team Yale ’ s Henry and Evan, Team Extreme ’ s Kristi and Jen, Team Big Brother ‘ s Cody and Jessica, and Team IndyCar ’ s Alex and Conor — jetted to Hong Kong to begin the final leg of Season 30, where they played with fire, fought with crabs and survived a man - made typhoon. Then came Cody ’ s absolute favorite part of the finale : getting to smash a bunch of computers and hard drives to pieces with a baseball bat.
